link.title: Park City Elementary - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: THE MHSA HAS CANCELED ALL SPRING SPORTS FOR SCHOOLS. THANK YOU TO ALL THOSE WHO WERE GOING TO PARTICIPATE IN GOLF, TRACK, AND SOFTBALL. SENIORS, THANK YOU FOR THE YEARS, EFFORT, AND SWEAT YOU HAVE PUT IN OVER THE PAST 4 YEARS.
SCHOOL FACILITIES WILL CONTINUE TO BE CLOSED THROUGH AT LEAST MAY 6 DUE TO THE CORONAVIRUS. ALL SCHOOLING IS NOW ONLINE OR THROUGH PACKETS UNTIL THE FACILITIES ARE OPENED TO THE PUBLIC AGAIN.

BREAKFAST AND LUNCH IS STILL BEING DELIVERED BY BUS ALONG OUR ROUTES MONDAY-FRIDAY. THEY CAN ALSO BE PICKED UP AT THE SCHOOL FROM 9-10:30. THIS IS FOR ALL CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL DISTRICT AGED 0-18. YOU JUST NEED TO FILL OUT A SIMPLE FORM ON THE SCHOOL WEBSITE.

PLEASE REMEMBER TO SIGN UP YOUR CHILDREN TO GET BREAKFAST AND LUNCH STARTING MONDAY, APRIL 6. THERE IS NO COST FOR THESE MEALS AND THEY ARE FOR CHILDREN AGE 0-18 IN OUR DISTRICT. THE SIGN UP FORM AND MORE INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON THE SCHOOL WEBSITE.

div.a: Read More
Thursday Coffee Break with Mr. Grabowska
Drivers Education

span.p: Drivers Education will start on May 4. If you wish to sign up your student driver, please call Brenda at the school. Classes will likely be online with some small scheduled meetings with the teacher. Cost is $210. Student must be 14.5 years of age prior to June 12.

BREAKFAST AND LUNCH SIGN UP FORM

a.span: BREAKFAST AND LUNCH SIGN UP FORM

div.a: BREAKFAST AND LUNCH FOR NON BUS RIDERS

span.p: Starting Monday, April 6, we are going to be providing free sack breakfast and sack lunch to any child between 0 - 18 that resides within our school district. Meals will be ready for pick up at the main entrance of the school between 9 and 10:30 AM. If there are families in town that don't have students in school yet or are home schooled, please let them know to fill out a participation form.
We need everyone who is participating to fill out the following form to participate. Please fill it out only once. If you change your mind and don't want the meals, please contact the school.

div.a: BREAKFAST AND LUNCH

span.p: Starting Monday, April 6, we are going to be providing free sack breakfast and sack lunch to any child between 0 - 18 that resides within our school district. Buses will deliver to those who live on the bus route. The routes will be running 2 hours later than normal in the morning to deliver both meals. So Bus #1 will have its first stop at 9:12 AM instead of 7:12. Bus #5 will have its first stop at 9:03 AM instead of 7:03. And Bus #4 will have its first stop at 9:00 AM instead of 7. If there are families along the routes that don't have students in school yet or are home schooled, please contact the school to let us know who you are and your address.
We need everyone who is participating to fill out the following form to participate. Please fill it out only once. If you change your mind and don't want the meals, please contact the school.

div.a: Spring Activities

span.p: The Montana High School Association has suspended all spring MHSA activities through April 24th, which includes all practices, meets, contests, or festivals. Further guidance will be provided the closer we get to the 24th.
